Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Directs the court to provide notice to the former owners of foreclosed property of the right to file a claim for the excess funds from the sale of the real property
Summary: Directs the court to provide notice to the former owners of foreclosed property of the right to file a claim for the excess funds from the sale of the real property.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
LawCode: Amd §§1354, RPAP L; amd §1136, RPT L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law and the real property tax law, in relation to requiring the court in a foreclosure action to provide notice to the former owner of the real property of the right to apply for surplus moneys from the sale of such property
